sect2.title: Default Image Grid
sect2.para:
This page lets you customize the default properties of GIMP's grid, which can be toggled on or off using
View Show Grid
from the main menu.

sect3.title: Activating the Dialog
sect3.para:
The preferences dialog can be accessed from the main menu, through
Edit Preferences .

sect3.title: Options
sect3.para:
The settings here match those in the Configure Image Grid dialog, which can be used to reconfigure the grid for an existing image, by choosing
Image Configure Grid
from the main menu. See the Configure Grid dialog section for information on the meaning of each of the settings.
